name: Fare Pasifika Design System Principles
description:
Fare Pasifika Design System Principles


I like this project because the concept and content were derived directly from user research. I imagined it as an ad campaign in mass transit vehicles and stations. It's a good candidate for a design systems example because it has eight different versions and the many Seattle Metro ad formats are analagous to the different screen sizes of interactive devices.
